stories.text:
1. Ex-wife will get 100% of the online company I legally started and fully own as the sole proprietor.

2. LLC is incorporated in Wyoming.

3. There is a Business Checking account + CCard associated to the business.

4. She is NOT a US Citizen.

------

Option 1: Sell all Shares to her, and transfer ownership.

Option 2: Have her make a new LLC via Stripe

Option 3: Something else that is easier??
stories.title: Ask HN: Transfer LLC or Create a New One?

stories.text:
I don’t know if there is an official definition of micro SaaS, maybe we can settle for less than 4K per month in revenue? Or do you have a better definition?

Anyway, how did you get started? Where did you find the idea?
stories.title: Ask HN: Those with micro SaaS, how did you get your idea?
